name: Pascal & Pearce
description:
'''Pascal & Pearce''' is a [[DJ]] and [[record producer]] duo from [[Cape Town]], [[South Africa]]. The group was formed in 2007, and consists of Pascal Ellinas and Dave Pearce - not to be confused with [[BBC Radio]] DJ [[Dave Pearce]].

The group produces a wide range of styles of [[electronic dance music]]. They have released a number of albums, including ''[[Passport (Pascal & Pearce album)|Passport]]''  and ''[[One Night Only (Pascal & Pearce album)|One Night Only]]'', and have been nominated for three [[South African Music Awards]].
